verses.roman:
sahaje caitanya-caritra--ghana-dugdha-pūra
rāmānanda-caritra tāhe khaṇḍa pracura

synonyms: sahaje—generally; caitanya-caritra—the activities of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; ghana-dugdha-pūra—like condensed milk; rāmānanda-caritra—the story of Rāmānanda Rāya; tāhe—in that; khaṇḍa—sugar candy; pracura—a large quantity.
translation: The activities of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu are like condensed milk, and the activities of Rāmānanda Rāya are like large quantities of sugar candy.
